过滤filter

1. date

关于时间的过滤

{{ post.date | date: “%b %Y”}} => May 2019 {{ post.date }} => 2019-06-14 08:18:09 +0800 {{ post.date | date: “%Y-%m-%d %H:%M” }} => 2018-12-06 04:24 {{ “now” | date: “%Y-%m-%d %H:%M” }} {{ “today” | date: “%Y-%m-%d %H:%M” }}
